title: Empty array in yaml should be valid
body:
### Describe the bug

I should be able to use the yaml representation of an empty array in a config for a required property.

### Expected behavior

Successfully loads empty list

### Actual behavior

```
ConfigurationException: Failed to load config value of type java.util.List<java.lang.String> for: app.my-list
```

### How to Reproduce?

```java
@ConfigProperty(name = "app.my-list")
List<String> myList;
```

```yaml
app:
  my-list: []
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

Quarkus 1.16.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.5.1

### Additional information

_No response_
